name: Roxam
aura: Increases Ally C.RATE in Doom Tower battles by 23%.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of filling this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%. Also has a 50% chance of placing a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if this attack is critical.

Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50%. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on the target for 1 turn when attacking while undera [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff on the target for 1 turn when attacking without a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns after attacking without a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

While under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 25% [Weaken] debuff. Decreases the cooldown of Jungle Ambush by 2 turns. While not under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 25% [Weaken] debuff before attacking. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns after attacking.
Places a [Block Debuffs] and a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 1 turn, and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 2 turns whenever they receive a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.
